# Contributing
1. Fork it!
2. Create your feature branch
3. Pass all CI tests, including strict:
    - `mypy` (typing)
    - `flake8` (PEP8 coding style)
    - `vulture` (dead code)
    - `bandit` (security issues)
    - `pydocstyle` (docstrings)
    - `pipdeptree` (dependencies)
4. Submit a pull request
